short_summary: This is a continuation of solicitation CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296/A, but with some changes.
description: This is a continuation of solicitation CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296/A. If you have already sent a proposal as part of CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296/A, there is no need to resubmit on this solicitation.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
### Remote Simultaneous Interpretation Request for Proposal

#### Overview

The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) is inviting qualified service providers to submit a proposal for Remote Simultaneous Interpretation (RSI) services to support CSPS upcoming events.

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: CSPS-RFP-22JP-0296/B
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 1, 2022, at 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Publication Date**: October 26, 2022
* **Amendment Number**: 0

#### Scope of Work

CSPS is seeking a service provider to provide RSI services on an on-demand basis for a period of up to one (1) year with the option to extend for an additional year. The successful provider will be required to provide interpretation services for CSPS events, as and when requested.

#### Budget

The total allocated budget for this requirement, including option years, is $450,000.00, excluding applicable taxes. The initial contract budget is $250,000.00 for the first year, with an additional $100,000.00 per year for the two one-year option periods.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement.

#### Submission Instructions

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document can be downloaded from the Canadabenefits vendor portal: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/40d5001f6cb9e381a4813b9429f099c5/repost_rfp_remote_si.pdf  English> or <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/26/7eb7f1000f81ae64e9d4aeb327f28492/repost_rfp_interpretation_simultanee_a_distance.pdf> French.

For more information, please contact:

* **Jean-Pierre Archamb
